org.apache.archiva.redback.common.ldap.role

Interface LdapRoleMapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLdapRoleMapper

    public interface LdapRoleMapper
    will map ldap group to redback role
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    Olivier Lamy

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<String> getAllGroups(DirContext context)
      read all groups from ldap
      List<String> getAllRoles(DirContext context)
      read all ldap groups then map to corresponding role (if no mapping found group is ignored)
      List<String> getGroups(String username, DirContext context)

      • getAllGroups

        List<String> getAllGroups(DirContext context)
                   throws MappingException
        read all groups from ldap
        Returns:
        all LDAP groups
        Throws:
        MappingException

      • getAllRoles

        List<String> getAllRoles(DirContext context)
                  throws MappingException
        read all ldap groups then map to corresponding role (if no mapping found group is ignored)
        Returns:
        all roles
        Throws:
        MappingException

        Returns:

      • getLdapGroupClass

      • saveRole

        boolean saveRole(String roleName,
                 DirContext context)
          throws MappingException
        will save a ldap group corresponding to the mapping. will do nothing in group already exists.
        Parameters:
        roleName -
        Returns:
        true if role was added, false if role already exists
        Throws:
        MappingException

      • saveUserRole

        boolean saveUserRole(String roleName,
                     String username,
                     DirContext context)
              throws MappingException
        associate role to user in ldap
        Parameters:
        roleName -
        username -
        Returns:
        true if role was added to user, false if role already exists for the user
        Throws:
        MappingException
